fields.1-name.placeholder.description: An example to guide the user for field '1-name'

fields.10-icca-conservation-status.helpe.message: Is the ICCA recognised by the national government for its role in conservation (e.g. as a protected area)? Select "Designated" if the ICCA is legally-designated as a protected area or other type of conservation area. Select "Established" if the ICCA is established by the indigenous people or local community, but not legally-designated as a protected area or other type of conservation area. Select "Proposed" if the ICCA is approved for future legal-designation as a protected area or other type of conservation area

fields.10-icca-conservation-status.place.description: An example to guide the user for field '10-icca-conservation-status'

fields.11-icca-year.helperText.message: In which year did this status come into effect? If the status is established, this is the year in which the ICCA first came into being. You can also answer "Unknown" or "Time immemorial"

fields.11-icca-year.placeholder.description: An example to guide the user for field '11-icca-year'

fields.12-icca-type.helperText.message: This can be the legal designation of the ICCA, e.g. Indigenous Reserve, or the type of ICCA as defined by the indigenous people or community, e.g. sacred site.

fields.12-icca-type.placeholder.description: An example to guide the user for field '12-icca-type'

fields.13-icca-objectives.helperText.message: What are the main objectives of managing the ICCA?

fields.13-icca-objectives.placeholder.description: An example to guide the user for field '13-icca-objectives'

fields.14-icca-other.helperText.message: Any other important information you would like to share

fields.14-icca-other.placeholder.description: An example to guide the user for field '14-icca-other'
fields.14-icca-other.placeholder.message: Any other important information you would like to share

fields.2-icca-country.helperText.message: What country is this ICCA located in?

fields.2-icca-country.placeholder.description: An example to guide the user for field '2-icca-country'

fields.3-icca-area.helperText.message: Select the ICCA shape and press Ctrl-i to get statistics of the area.

fields.3-icca-area.placeholder.description: An example to guide the user for field '3-icca-area'

fields.4-icca-land-sea.label.message: 4. Is the ICCA on land, in the sea, or both?

fields.4-icca-land-sea.placeholder.description: An example to guide the user for field '4-icca-land-sea'

fields.4a-icca-sea-area.helperText.message: If the ICCA includes any area in the sea, what is the size, in kilometres-squared, of this part?

fields.4a-icca-sea-area.label.message: 4a. Area of ICCA in the sea (km²)

fields.4a-icca-sea-area.placeholder.description: An example to guide the user for field '4a-icca-sea-area'

fields.5-icca-no-take.helperText.message: Is there a part of the ICCA where no natural resources can be taken or used (a no-take area)? This can be seasonal, temporary or permanent.

fields.5-icca-no-take.placeholder.description: An example to guide the user for field '5-icca-no-take'

fields.5a-icca-no-take-area.helperText.message: What is the size, in kilometres-squared, of the no-take area?

fields.5a-icca-no-take-area.placeholder.description: An example to guide the user for field '5a-icca-no-take-area'

fields.6-icca-boundary-criteria.helperTe.message: Describe the criteria used to determine the boundary of the ICCA, e.g. is it an area of traditional resource use and occupation, or actual resource use and occupation, or a site of cultural or historical significance?

fields.6-icca-boundary-criteria.placehol.description: An example to guide the user for field '6-icca-boundary-criteria'
fields.6-icca-boundary-criteria.placehol.message: Describe the criteria used to determine the boundary

fields.7-icca-neighbours.helperText.message: If the boundary has been agreed with neighbours, indicate the name and location of neighbours and the dates of agreements. If the boundary has not been agreed, please indicate the status of negotiations of discussions. You may put "Not applicable" if there are no other peoples neighbouring the ICCA.

fields.7-icca-neighbours.placeholder.description: An example to guide the user for field '7-icca-neighbours'
fields.7-icca-neighbours.placeholder.message: Has the boundary been agreed with all neighbouring peoples?

fields.8-icca-sharing.helperText.message: Is the area delimited by the boundary used and occupied exclusively by your people or is it shared with other peoples or communities?

fields.8-icca-sharing.placeholder.description: An example to guide the user for field '8-icca-sharing'
fields.8-icca-sharing.placeholder.message: Is the ICCA shared with other peoples of communities?

fields.9-icca-decision-making.helperText.message: Select "Collaborative governance" if one entity is responsible but is required to consult with others. Select "Joint Governance" if two or more entities are jointly responsible

fields.9-icca-decision-making.label.message: 9. Who is responsible for the decision-making and rules of the ICCA?

fields.9-icca-decision-making.placeholde.description: An example to guide the user for field '9-icca-decision-making'

fields.culture.placeholder.description: An example to guide the user for field 'culture'
fields.culture.placeholder.message: What happened here, or why is this place important to the community?

fields.icca-legal-recognition.helperText.message: Is the area delimited by the boundary legally recognised by your national governments? (Question 10, above, refers to conservation status. This question refers to recognition of land rights within the area)

fields.icca-legal-recognition.placeholde.description: An example to guide the user for field 'icca-legal-recognition'

fields.name.placeholder.description: An example to guide the user for field 'name'

fields.resource.placeholder.description: An example to guide the user for field 'resource'

fields.threat.placeholder.description: An example to guide the user for field 'threat'
